Key.English: Use a Medipack on all limbs
Key.German: Benutzt das Medipack an allen verletzten Gliedmaßen.
Key.Hungarian: Use a Medipack on all limbs
Key.Italian: Use a Medipack on all limbs
Key.French: Use a Medipack on all limbs
Key.Russian: Use a Medipack on all limbs
Key.Polish: Use a Medipack on all limbs

Key.English: Put Tourniquets to all needed limbs
Key.German: Setze Aderklemmen an blutenden Gliedmaßen an
Key.Hungarian: Put Tourniquets to all needed limbs
Key.Italian: Put Tourniquets to all needed limbs
Key.French: Put Tourniquets to all needed limbs
Key.Russian: Put Tourniquets to all needed limbs
Key.Polish: Put Tourniquets to all needed limbs

Key.English: Put Tourniquets to all needed limbs
Key.German: Setzt Aderklemmen an allen blutenden Gliedmaßen an.

Key.Italian: Put Tourniquets to all needed limbs
Key.French: Put Tourniquets to all needed limbs
Key.Russian: Put Tourniquets to all needed limbs
Key.Polish: Put Tourniquets to all needed limbs

Key.German: Alle Aderklemmen werden von den Gliedmaßen entfernt.

Key.English: You cand do that while doing something else
Key.German: Das kannst Du nicht während einer anderen Aktion tun
Key.Hungarian: You cand do that while doing something else
Key.Italian: You cand do that while doing something else
Key.French: You cand do that while doing something else
Key.Russian: You cand do that while doing something else
Key.Polish: You cand do that while doing something else

Key.English: Please wait till your current action has finished!
Key.German: Bitte warte, bis die momentane Aktion beendet ist!
Key.Hungarian: Please wait till your current action has finished!
Key.Italian: Please wait till your current action has finished!
Key.French: Please wait till your current action has finished!
Key.Russian: Please wait till your current action has finished!
Key.Polish: Please wait till your current action has finished!

Key.English: Youre previous action has not finished yet. Please wait!
Key.German: Deine momentane Aktion ist noch nicht beendet. Warte bitte!
Key.Hungarian: Youre previous action has not finished yet. Please wait!
Key.Italian: Youre previous action has not finished yet. Please wait!
Key.French: Youre previous action has not finished yet. Please wait!
Key.Russian: Youre previous action has not finished yet. Please wait!
Key.Polish: Youre previous action has not finished yet. Please wait!

Key.English: Youre dead because of a morphine overdose
Key.German: Du bist an einer Überdosis Morphin gestorben
Key.Hungarian: Youre dead because of a morphine overdose
Key.Italian: Youre dead because of a morphine overdose
Key.French: Youre dead because of a morphine overdose
Key.Russian: Youre dead because of a morphine overdose
Key.Polish: Youre dead because of a morphine overdose

Key.English: Youre knocked out because of a morphine overdose
Key.German: Du wurdest aufgrund einer Überdosis Morphin ohnmächtig
Key.Hungarian: Youre knocked out because of a morphine overdose
Key.Italian: Youre knocked out because of a morphine overdose
Key.French: Youre knocked out because of a morphine overdose
Key.Russian: Youre knocked out because of a morphine overdose
Key.Polish: Youre knocked out because of a morphine overdose

Key.English: Youre knocked out as you got not enough blood in your body
Key.German: Du bist aufgrund hohen Blutverlustes ohnmächtig
Key.Hungarian: Youre knocked out as you got not enough blood in your body
Key.Italian: Youre knocked out as you got not enough blood in your body
Key.French: Youre knocked out as you got not enough blood in your body
Key.Russian: Youre knocked out as you got not enough blood in your body
Key.Polish: Youre knocked out as you got not enough blood in your body

Key.English: Youre knocked out as your blood presure is too low
Key.German: Du bist aufgrund zu geringen Blutdrucks ohnmächtig

Key.Italian: Youre knocked out as your blood presure is too low
Key.French: Youre knocked out as your blood presure is too low

Key.English: You got unconscious because of your pulse
Key.German: Du wurdest wegen deines Pulses ohnmächtig
Key.Hungarian: You got unconscious because of your pulse
Key.Italian: You got unconscious because of your pulse
Key.French: You got unconscious because of your pulse
Key.Russian: You got unconscious because of your pulse
Key.Polish: You got unconscious because of your pulse

Key.English: Youre knocked out as youre too heavily damaged

Key.English: You got killed! Please Imagine a white light ^^
Key.German: Du wurdest getötet! Stelle dir bitte ein weißes Licht vor ^^

Key.German: Erfolg! Er ist wieder am Leben...
